name: Smash Frenzy
description: Smash Frenzy is a bottle smashing challenge game for android devices. Smash as many bottles as you can while avoiding the metal bars, bronze bottles and silver bottles. Earn points by smashing the glass bottles while avoiding the obstacles. The game has three levels, Easy, Medium and Hard. You can choose to play any level after clicking the start button. Now let’s see the highest number of bottles you can smash.
